rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious lobby with a minimalist design featuring polished concrete floors and warm wood accents. It adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring proper ventilation and natural light, acting as the transitional space between outdoors and indoors.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: A modern open-plan living-dining-kitchen area with an L-shaped design to maximize space. Large windows enhance natural lighting in keeping with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy bedroom optimized for privacy and relaxation; features a queen-size bed, ample storage space. Positioning adheres to Vastu principles by placing it in the north-east corner.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bathroom with water-saving fixtures and a modern design layout that supports efficient space use while maintaining privacy. Vastu principles ensure proper placement relative to the bedroom.

rooms.name: Utility & Service Area
rooms.description: A multi-purpose utility area for storage and laundry with integrated smart solutions that allow flexibility on a tight budget. Follows Vastu guidelines by keeping it away from main living spaces.

openings.description: A double-door entrance with a glass facade to allow natural light and maintain modern aesthetics. Aligns with Vastu principles by ensuring clear entry flow.
Large sliding windows placed strategically for optimum daylight, ensuring energy efficiency and comfort in accordance with local building norms.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A modern, outdoor living space providing an area for relaxation, social gatherings or even small garden activities. The design includes weather-resistant furniture and is compliant with local safety norms.

openings.description: A compact yet secure staircase designed to connect the ground floor with the rooftop terrace. The placement follows Vastu and local norms for emergency egress.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment
rooms.description: The core living space designed as a modern split-level studio apartment. The area is partitioned subtly using built-in furniture and varying floor levels to demarcate spaces while maintaining an open feel. Vastu principles have been considered in the flow and positioning of the studio.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows that enhance natural lighting and maintain a modern aesthetic while following Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
A discreet door ensuring connectivity between the studio apartment and the utility area, designed with privacy in mind.

vastu.alignment: The design follows traditional Vastu principles by aligning entry points towards the south-east, using natural elements for light and ventilation, and positioning critical spaces such as bedroom and kitchen in energetically favorable zones.
vastu.budget_considerations: Cost-efficient materials like polished concrete, bamboo accents, and multipurpose built-in furniture have been prioritized to stay within a tight budget while achieving a luxury feel.
